casebody.data:
LILLIE
v.
CARVER 421P10-7 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, Patrick Nadolski, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Robert Alan Lillie, for Lillie, Robert Alan.

*566The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of September 2017 by Petitioner to Reconsider:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."
